subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
Swimming
lead_paragraph: After threatening to take legal action to gain entry into the men’s 10,000-meter run on Friday at the Olympic track and field trials, a group of athletes canceled an arbitration hearing set for Thursday afternoon.
snippet: After threatening to take legal action to gain entry into the men’s 10,000-meter run on Friday at the Olympic track and field trials, a group of athletes canceled an arbitration hearing set for Thursday afternoon.
